column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=Neurofibromatosis is a genetic disorder that causes tumors to grow throughout the body and the nervous system .
#Text=The tumors grow anywhere on the body .
#Text=NF-2 is when the tumors grow on the inside and on the hearing nerves and the eyes .
#Text=How are you affected ?
#Text=I have NF-1 and the tumors are outward , they call this disfigurement and it has affected my legs and the left side of my face .
#Text=( interviewer directs the camera )
#Text=How did you find out you had NF ?
#Text=I was eight months old , and that 's when we found out about neurofibromatosis .
#Text=At that time they were calling it " von Recklinghausen disease " .

column1: #Text=My mom took me to the Shriners Hospital , they examined me and that 's when they told her , I had von Recklinghausen disease or neurofibromatosis .
#Text=They found a small tumor on my heel and a small tumor on my eye and one in my mouth , on the roof of my mouth .
#Text=Was it painful ?
#Text=At that time I remember my mom telling me , that the tumor on my leg was really painful , because she would cry when she would try to put shoes on my feet .
#Text=How did your mom react to finding out you had neurofibromatosis ?
#Text=Did she know anything about it ?
#Text=My mom did n't know anything about it until I was diagnosed .
#Text=And they saw my mom 's arm and they said , you know , this right here is a tumor and this is where it came from .
#Text=And they said it is the same type of tumor .
#Text=She was very hurt , you know , she asked the doctors if it was something she did .
#Text=Because she thought that is was something she did during the pregnancy that caused this disfigurement .
#Text=What causes NF ?
#Text=NF is caused by a defective gene .
#Text=And this gene is defective and it is telling the body to grow tumors .
#Text=Growing up
#Text=What was it like growing up , as a child in elementary school ?
#Text=Growing up and going to elementary and being a child was really difficult , because you knew that you looked different from all of the other kids .
#Text=And they all were wearing the right shoes and I had to wear different shoes .
#Text=And I just looked different from anyone I had ever seen .
#Text=Was your face as disfigured as it is now ?
#Text=Well , yes , my eye was really a lot different growing up , but my lip and the left side of my cheek ...
#Text=that was , you know , really noticeable .
#Text=And it was really difficult going to school because there were a lot of kids that used to make fun .
#Text=And there were some that were nice .
